descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's are pleased to offer for sale this beautiful 2 bedroom apartment in Golfville located at the Dubai Hills Estate.
Golfville is a residential development in Dubai Hills Estate featuring one and two bedroom apartments. This project is similar to Collective and Collective 2.0, promoting a unique co-living, co-working concept. Golfville will offer premium collaborative living near the golf course.
Golfville is featuring one and two bedroom apartments.This is a 13 story building consisting of 306 apartments and is located on the golf course side of Dubai Hills (near the Club Villas). Apartments in Golfville will offer views of the Golf Course, pool, or boulevard. The tower will offer amenities scubas a protein cafe, co-working rooms, yoga zone, play & CrossFit zone, pool, larger common areas, as well as an indoor and outdoor movie area.
Dubai Hills is very-well connected to the rest of the city via Al Khail Road - 10 to 12 min. drive to Downtown and Marina. Connected via Al Qudra Road as well. 7 min drive to Mall of the Emirates and Sheikh Zayed Road.
Contact Gulf Sotheby's International Realty for a full project overview of this extraordinary project."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are very pleased to be able to offer this type F townhouse in Mira Oasis 1 which is in a great location and directly on the pool and park.
The type F is the largest of all of the vill types in Mira Oasis with 2,975 sq ft of living space.
The accommodation comprises an entrance hall, downstairs shower room, study/5th bedroom, large living room, fitted kitchen and maids toom on the ground floor.
On the first floor, the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, a second, guest bedroom also has en-suite facilities and two further bedrooms and two further bedrooms share a jack and jill shower room.
Outside, the property enjoys a corner plot within the cluster measuring close to 4,000 sq ft.
The property is ready for handover and represents excellent value at some AED 900,000 below what the owner of the property paid.
Please call Martin +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae']

['DescriptionWell located in a superb development within good range of Dubai Marina, this generous one bedroom duplex apartment offers extensive living space, generous mezzaine bedroom in a building with hotel services for residents.
Laguna Tower is set in the heart of Jumeirah Lake Towers, mixed use community with residential and commercial towers. The building has a Moveinpick hotel inside with bars and restaurants for resident use. Access to Dubai Marina is easy with Dubai Metro only a few minutes walk away. 
The property sits on the 37th floor of the tower delivering stunning south facing views. Being fully furnished throughout and currently rented for 105,000 aed. The kitchen is open plan to a spacious and well equipped living room. The mezzanine floor is large leading into ample wardrobe space and a well equipped bathroom. 
The seller is motivated and invites serious offers close to 1,050,000. Viewing can be arrange with 24 hours notice. 
The property will be vacate by mid Jan 2020 and is an excellent option for an end-user also
Exclusively managed by Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties
Call our Specialist on +971504127168 to find out more.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionA bespoke 6 bedroom Mansion located in the crown frond of the Palm Jumeirah. Nestled in a landscaped plot of 1091.60 Sq.M. (11,750 Sq.ft.) and surrounded by palm trees giving the residents a peaceful and tranquil living.
Welcoming you is the large open plan living room with floor to ceiling double glazed windows attracting natural sunlight. Consist of ground floor hall, Majlis and dining area on an Italian satuario marble flooring. The home is built with world class materials. Full home automation by Legrand – BTICINO system with complete control for Lights (dimming), AC & Curtains, Audio Video intercom system with IP CCTV, Lights are from LEDS- C4 made in Spain and all Sanitary ware & Fixtures from Bagno Design (London). 
Featuring a gymnasium where Jump Air Basic - sports flooring is made in Hungary. Outside there is a  temperature controlled swimming pool to complete the 'staycation' appeal, cladding made with Italian Traventine and 2 covered parking bays.
This villa has a fascinating 180 degree Atlantis and beach views. Relax your day and enjoy the sunset view at night from the three corners of the property. Located on the Tip of the Frond I and all the interiors are designed by Interior decorator – Décor Point. This one of a kind villa is truly a paradise at your own doorstep.
Call Berskshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties on +971504127168 to find out more."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionKnight Frank is pleased to present to the market this well maintained Canal Cove located between the desirable  K and L fronds on the Palm Jumeirah, with beautiful views up the frond. 
Offering a plot size of 5,045 sq. ft. with an internal living space of 4,100 sq. ft. this home perfectly combines luxury indoor and outdoor living.   
This well cared for fully furnished townhouse is arranged over two floors and offers four en-suite bedrooms. The ground floor offers a modern kitchen, a large open plan living dining area, a separate sitting room, all facing the mature gardens and large pool. An en-suite guest bedroom and guest powder room complete this floor.
Rising to the first floor you find three more ensuite bedrooms. The master suite has its own sitting room and access to a large terrace,its balcony has beautiful views over the gardens, pool and sea.
The large swimming pool, communal gardens and direct beach access offer a relaxed lifestyle.
There is private garaging for 2 cars.']
